'''Beta 1.17.30.25''' is the tenth and final beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.17.30]], released on September 9, 2021,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4408868323213|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.17.30.25 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=September 9, 2021}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed invisible blocks in The End ({{bug|MCPE-139769}}).</onlyinclude>
